alert.note: Alert for Gove; Graham; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 06 at 9:22AM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Graham, Gove and Wichita Counties. * WHEN...From Monday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Local snowfall amounts could exceed 6 inches, especially in the southeastern portions of each county. Late Monday morning through the evening could see the most hazardous conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
